===[[War in Heaven]]===
After [[Lucifer (Earth-616)|Lucifer]]'s rebellion, many [[Angels (Monotheism)|angels]] of the Heavenly Hosts were cast out from [[Heaven (Paradise)|Heaven]] for their part in the conflict.{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe: Horror 2005 Vol 1 1|; [[Lilith (Earth-616)|Lilith]]'s entry}}{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Imdugud (Earth-616)|Pazuzu]]'s entry}}

===[[Hyborian Age]]===
During the Hyborian Age, the [[Zoroastrian god]] [[Mithra (Earth-616)|Mithra, under his name Mitra]] and monotheistic worship, was told to command to a heavenly host of [[Angels of Mitra|angels]] and saints,{{r|Official Handbook of the Conan Universe #1|; Gods and Worship's entry}} the former appearing on occasion on [[Earth]].
